attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I beleave the narrowing of roads by sodc council in and around country villages should be removed as i think it is dangerous and of poor design to drive down the middle or oppersite side of the road  towards oncoming traffic in the bad fog. As i think this will kill somebody in the future in bad weather conditions as this areas are not lit well or not marked on the road surface very well before the event and are also some poor locations ie at road junctions like the one in shippon near abingdon a simple speed hump would do a better job

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
